segments.text: Good morning . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to apply for a passport here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please fill in these forms and take them back when you are done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( 10 minutes later . ) Hi . Here are completed forms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Can I have your original ID card and tw0 2 - inch photos ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are , But I forgot my photos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is OK . We have photo taking service here . You may pay your fee , take a photo there and take it back here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I am going right now .
segments.speaker: S2
